column1: #Text=Polycrystalline samples of (Y1-xPrx)Ba2Cu3O7, with x=0.0, 0.10, 0.30, 0.50 were prepared by standard\rsolid state reaction technique using stoichiometric amounts of high purity powders precursors, such as:\rY2O3, Pr6O11, BaCO3 and CuO from Alfa Aesear.
#Text=The resultant powders were reground and pelletized\rinto disc-shape.

#Text=We applied thermal treatments for three times consisting of the following steps:\rcalcinated to 1203K for 24h, synthesized to 1208K for 24h, and then annealed to 773K for 20h in\roxidizing atmosphere.
